SELECT m.uid,m.total_earn, IFNULL(mall.charge_earn,0.0) all_charge_earn,IFNULL(mall.advertise_earn,0.0) all_advertise_earn, IFNULL(myest.charge_earn,0.0) yest_charge_earn,IFNULL(myest.advertise_earn,0.0) yest_advertise_earn, IFNULL(mseven.charge_earn,0.0) seven_charge_earn,IFNULL(mseven.advertise_earn,0.0) seven_advertise_earn from hd_meruser m LEFT JOIN (SELECT sum(charge_earn) as charge_earn, sum(advertise_earn) as advertise_earn, uid from hd_mer_earncollect where uid = #{uid}) mall on mall.uid = m.uid LEFT JOIN (SELECT sum(charge_earn) as charge_earn, sum(advertise_earn) as advertise_earn, uid from hd_mer_earncollect where uid = #{uid} and TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(create_time) <= 1) myest on myest.uid = m.uid LEFT JOIN (SELECT sum(charge_earn) as charge_earn, sum(advertise_earn) as advertise_earn, uid from hd_mer_earncollect where uid = #{uid} and YEARWEEK(date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(now())-1) mseven on mseven.uid = m.uid where m.uid = #{uid}
SELECT charge_earn, advertise_earn,create_time from hd_mer_earncollect where uid = #{uid} and create_time >= #{createTime} order by id desc

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN paysource = 1 THEN money END),0.0) as allchargemoney, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN paysource = 1 THEN advertise_money END),0.0) as alladvertisemoney, IFNULL(count(CASE WHEN paysource = 1 THEN 1 END),0) as totalnum, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN paysource = 4 and `status` = 1 THEN money END),0.0) as allwithdrawmoney, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN paysource = 4 and `status` = 2 THEN money END),0.0) as allrefundwithdrawmoney from hd_mer_detail where merid = #{uid} and create_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
